About JSON Formatter

An essential tool for developers to format, validate, and beautify JSON data. Makes working with JSON easier and more efficient.

Key Features

  • Format and beautify JSON
  • Validate JSON syntax
  • Minify JSON
  • Convert JSON to XML/CSV
  • Tree view for complex structures
  • Syntax highlighting

Use Cases

  • Debugging API responses
  • Cleaning up minified JSON
  • Validating configuration files
  • Converting data formats
  • Learning JSON structure
